reg.acttitle: Hotel Room Tax Act; Provincial Sales Tax Act*
reg.title: Hotel Room Tax Regulation for the Nelson Kootenay Lake Tourism Society
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 116/2011, June 20, 2011]

section.sectiontext: In this regulation, Act means the Hotel Room Tax Act.

February 28, 2010 is the prescribed date after which section 3 of the Act applies in respect of accommodation purchased in the City of Nelson, Village of Kaslo and the Regional District of Central Kootenay Electoral Areas D, E and F.

The tax payable under section 3 (1) of the Act is 2% of the purchase price of accommodation purchased in the City of Nelson, Village of Kaslo and the Regional District of Central Kootenay Electoral Areas D, E and F.

section.marginalnote: Prescribed purpose for expenditure of tax
section.sectiontext: The Nelson Kootenay Lake Tourism Society may spend the amount paid to it out of the revenue collected from the tax for tourism marketing, programs and projects.
This regulation is repealed effective March 1, 2015.

footnote.footnotetext: See section 45 of the Provincial Sales Tax Transitional Provisions and Amendments Act, 2013, S.B.C. 2013, c. 1
